Interests:

Background:

Forged in the firey pits of taurus, he was cast out unto his unsuspecting Cuban parent and raised on the mean streets of Miami, FL. After highschool he moved up to Boston to attend Boston University's Communication School. He has spent 5 years in sales, and has realized it BOOOOOOOORES him. His true destiny lays within Search Marketing, where he can assist dynamic companies in saving valuable dollars by efficiently leveraging Google Advertising and Search Engine Optimization. He hopes to return one day to his sunny homeland and open his own search agency to assist in the recovery of Miami's job economy and make a difference.
